A new hope

Alberto Peña Abril • Sunday 12 June 2011

Let’s see how github blogs work!

I’ve been blogging for a long time (well, not that long) on Blogger. It was ok, and it served my purpose at that moment, but I think it is time to change.

I’m going to start blogging here, on Github, at least for now…

Since I don’t want to spend a lot of time right now with the css, the feed or the comments, I just copied Chris Parsons’ Github blog (Thank you, Chris). I promise I’ll change it in the future.

See you!
